Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Wattwoodpecker" is applied when you actually calculate the damage from a battle, and it does not start a Chain.\n2. If "Wattwoodpecker" battles "Dark Ruler Ha Des" and would be destroyed, the effect of "Wattwoodpecker" is still applied.\n3. The effect of "Wattwoodpecker" is applied even if "Wattwoodpecker" would be destroyed by battle.
